articles.author: Nicholas Riccardi, Chinedu Asadu, Edward Acquah
articles.title: Ghana says all immigrants deported by the US have been sent home, contradicting lawyers - AP News
articles.description: Authorities in Ghana are pushing back on claims that four African immigrants recently deported by the U.S. remain in Ghanaian detention, reiterating their assertion that all such migrants have been returned to their home countries. The government said Monday …
articles.content: ACCRA, Ghana (AP) Authorities in Ghana pushed back Tuesday on claims that four African immigrants recently deported by the U.S. remain in Ghanaian detention, reiterating their assertion that all such… [+3492 chars]
